title: Silencing of spindle apparatus coiled-coil protein 1 suppressed the progression of hepatocellular carcinoma through farnesyltransferase-beta and increased drug sensitivity
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Yirui Zhai, Fan Wu, Xin Xu, Pan Zhao, Lingxia Xin, Mengyuan Li, Yuan Zong, Zhuanbo Yang, Zhuoran Li, Liming Wang, Bo Chen
